Title: Relates to establishing the office of racial equity and social justice
Summary: Establishes the office of racial equity and social justice to act as the official state planning and coordinating office for changes in policy, practice and allocation of state resources so that race or social justice constructs do not predict an individual's success, while also improving opportunities and outcomes for all people, and performing all necessary and appropriate services required to fulfill these duties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the office of racial equity and social justice
